name: CAP_PAY_RATE_ELEMENTS
description: This table stores rate element information used in a capitation transaction.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FRM_TBL_GRP_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The group type of the rate elements.

columns.name: LOOKUP_TABLE_ID
columns.description: The lookup table which was used to retrieve the rate element's values.

columns.name: LOOKUP_TABLE_ID_RATE_TABLE_NAME
columns.description: Name of the capitation rate table.

columns.name: MATCHED_CVG_ATTR_C_NAME
columns.description: The coverage attribute used to select the rate group from the lookup table.

columns.name: PREMIUM_BUCKET_ID
columns.description: The capitation bucket which was the source of capitation RR subcomponent amounts used in the formula.

columns.name: MEM_LIST_ROW_KEY
columns.description: The row number of the member in the member list (TML) to which each row in related group 3510 corresponds to for a specialty capitation transaction.

columns.name: MATCHED_RIDER_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The rider used to select the rate group from the lookup table.

columns.name: MATCHED_RIDER_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: MATCHED_RULE_ID
columns.description: The rule that passed when selecting the rate group for the lookup table.

columns.name: REFINEMENT_LOOKUP_TABLE_ID
columns.description: The additional refinement rate table used to look up a member's rate.

columns.name: REFINEMENT_LOOKUP_TABLE_ID_RATE_TABLE_NAME
columns.description: Name of the capitation rate table.
